home_tip_1: Keep indoor temperatures between 20â€“24Â°C for comfort and efficiency.
home_tip_2: Calibrate air quality sensors monthly for accurate gas detection.
home_tip_3: Install humidity sensors in kitchens and bathrooms to prevent mold.
home_tip_4: Activate motion alerts when the home is unoccupied for security.
home_tip_5: Use natural light sensors to reduce energy via automated blinds.
home_tip_6: Run appliances like washers during off-peak hours to save energy.
home_tip_7: Create custom routines (e.g. 'Good Night') to turn off all devices.
home_tip_8: Test smoke and gas detectors every month for safety assurance.
home_tip_9: Check energy usage reports weekly to track and improve efficiency.
home_tip_10: Use geofencing to open the gate automatically when you approach.
home_tip_11: Add parking sensors to monitor space availability in real time.
home_tip_12: Enable license plate recognition for secure garage access.
home_tip_13: Use lights with occupancy sensors to guide parking at night.
hydroponics_tip_1: Ensure the pH level stays between 5.5 - 6.5 for optimal plant health.
hydroponics_tip_2: Clean and check pump filters weekly to avoid clogs.
hydroponics_tip_4: Low water level may damage roots, refill when below 25%.
hydroponics_tip_5: Use sensors to automate nutrient control and lighting.
hydroponics_tip_6: Maintain TDS levels between 800-1200 ppm for optimal nutrient absorption.
warehouse_barn_tip_1: Keep barn ventilation active during hot days.
warehouse_barn_tip_2: Ensure warehouse alarm is tested weekly.
warehouse_barn_tip_3: Low humidity can damage stored materials.
warehouse_barn_tip_4: Check flame detectors monthly in both zones.
barn_flame_detected_alert: Barn Flame Detected... Please check the barn zone...
